description: Blazing Salads On Wheels is bringing superb salads and Mediterranean meals to the streets of Massachusetts! Pita pockets filled with salad, chicken, or steak, along with their delicious veggie rollers, and a rotating selection of astounding seasonal foods all ensure that you'll find something absolutely amazing every time you try this truck. Grab something great when you're on the go today, from Blazing Salads On Wheels!
name: Blazing Salads On Wheels
